name: Blooby Block
description:
Help Block rescue his friends from the terrible bluebies in this puzzle adventure. To do this, you must solve puzzles by pushing rocks, avoiding enemies and traps, and using spells.

This cube pushing puzzle Game is an evolution of the clasic sokoban and box pushing puzles with a multilevel 3D environment. Enemies, spells and traps add another level of complexity to the puzles. After the some initial simple levels, the difficulty grows fast, and the puzles become unforgiving, sometimes even frustrating. You will need to be smart if you want to help Block.

This game includes:
-120 original levels with increasing difficulty
-4 different types of enemies
-3 kinds of traps
-4 different spells
Just play whenever you feel like it and enjoy the different puzzles you will encounter along your journey.
